last_episode_to_air.name: The Scars of War
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sullivan asks for Father Brown’s help when Mrs Devine’s son Eddie is framed for murder.

name: Father Brown
overview: Father Brown is based on G. K. Chesterton's detective stories about a Catholic priest who doubles as an amateur detective in order to try and solve mysteries.

seasons.name: Series 2
seasons.overview: This season, Father Brown finds himself pitted against new Inspector  Sullivan, as the priest attempts to solve cases more sinister than ever -  an exorcism, an abduction, a poisoning and a murder put Father Brown's  instincts to the test and his own livelihood at risk.

seasons.name: Series 3
seasons.overview: In this series the priest finds himself embroiled with the Secret  Service, which puts Lady Felicia in a compromising position. Sid is sent  undercover into a theological college to flush out a killer and Mrs  McCarthy takes on a group of travellers when a local man is found dead.  Finally a fugitive takes sanctuary in St Mary's. Father Brown is stunned  to realise that the man in the confessional is in fact Inspector  Sullivan - and he's wanted for murder.

seasons.name: Series 4
seasons.overview: This season, a man missing for years returns just as his wife is about to remarry, but when he’s found dead, suspicion falls on those closest to him. The village gets a dose of Hollywood glamour when a film crew arrives. And Sid’s romance with a brewer’s daughter gets complicated when he finds out she’s not only married and he is also her alibi for the night her father is murdered.

episodes.name: The Hammer of God
episodes.overview: When an ungodly man is murdered at the unveiling of a new church clock,  Father Brown must find the killer before an innocent woman is sent to  the gallows.

episodes.name: The Flying Stars
episodes.overview: Father Brown becomes embroiled with a theatrical family when he discovers that a supposed tragic drowning was actually murder.

episodes.name: The Wrong Shape
episodes.overview: Soon  after his poetry recital, Leonard Quinton is found hanging in the  conservatory. When Father Brown realises that he could not have  committed suicide, the search begins for a murderer.

episodes.name: The Man in the Tree
episodes.overview: When  Lady Felicia finds a stripped and injured man stuck up a tree, Sid is  implicated as the perpetrator. Can Father Brown prove his innocence, or  has Sid gone too far this time?

episodes.name: The Eye of Apollo
episodes.overview: When  the Church of Apollo comes to Kembleford, Susie is drawn to their  charismatic leader Kalon. After Kalon's wife is murdered, Father Brown  must break his spell over Susie or risk losing her forever.

episodes.name: The Bride of Christ
episodes.overview: When  two nuns die in mysterious circumstances at St Agnes convent, Father  Brown investigates with the aid of Sister Boniface, an eager young fan  of detective novels.

episodes.name: The Devil's Dust
episodes.overview: Father Brown joins the search when a girl who is believed to be radioactive goes missing overnight. But just who is responsible for her disappearance?

episodes.name: The Face of Death
episodes.overview: After a murder at the Kembleford charity treasure hunt, general suspicion falls upon a bereaved man who wants revenge. However, Father Brown is determined to prove the man's innocence.

episodes.name: The Mayor and the Magician
episodes.overview: When the mayor drops dead during his speech at the Kembleford village fete, Father Brown deduces that he was deliberately electrocuted. Meanwhile, Mrs McCarthy's past comes back to haunt her.

episodes.name: The Blue Cross
episodes.overview: When his priceless Blue Cross is targeted by the infamous criminal Flambeau, Father Brown takes the initiative to try and save his soul. But is he walking into a trap?

episodes.name: The Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: Father  Brown is sceptical when a parishioner believes she's being haunted by  her sister who went missing years ago. However, when she herself  vanishes, he must investigate both disappearances.

episodes.name: Maddest of All
episodes.overview: When  an ex-serviceman drops dead in the street, Father Brown investigates the  facility where he was a patient. Could something sinister lie beneath  the surface at Danvers Retreat?

episodes.name: The Pride of the Prydes
episodes.overview: The  grand opening of Pryde Castle ends in disaster when a guide is struck by  an arrow. Contrary to Inspector Sullivan, Father Brown becomes  convinced that the motive lies buried in the family's past.

episodes.name: The Shadow of the Scaffold
episodes.overview: When  convicted killer Violet is given a temporary reprieve from the gallows,  she begs Father Brown to prove her innocence. With only three days in  hand, can he find the real culprit before it's too late?

episodes.name: The Mysteries of the Rosary
episodes.overview: The  mysterious disappearance of an old friend sends Father Brown and Sid on a  quest to find the mythical Lannington Rosary. However can an old  adversary, back from the dead, be trusted to help?

episodes.name: The Daughters of Jerusalem
episodes.overview: Father  Brown finds himself immobilised with a broken leg when a member of  Kembleford's WI dies in mysterious circumstances. Can he crack the case  armed only with a telescope and the gang to help?

episodes.name: The Three Tools of Death
episodes.overview: When a  troubled young woman's father is killed just weeks after her mother's  death, Father Brown must help her deal with her grief, while solving the  father's inexplicable murder by one of three weapons.

episodes.name: The Prize of Colonel Gerard
episodes.overview: Father  Brown is unconvinced when a recently returned prisoner of war is  suspected of the killing of his tyrannical uncle. And it seems that  someone will stop at nothing to keep the priest from the truth...

episodes.name: The Grim Reaper
episodes.overview: Through  a series of poison pen letters, a gruesome death on a local farm is  blamed on the Kembleford physician. Father Brown must figure out who  sent them in order to save his friend from the gallows.

episodes.name: The Laws of Motion
episodes.overview: A day  out at a local hill climb track ends with one of the drivers killed in a  car crash. When Father Brown will not stop investigating, an infuriated  Sullivan resolves to put an end to his meddling for good.

2.name: Series 2
2.overview: This season, Father Brown finds himself pitted against new Inspector  Sullivan, as the priest attempts to solve cases more sinister than ever -  an exorcism, an abduction, a poisoning and a murder put Father Brown's  instincts to the test and his own livelihood at risk.

episodes.name: The Man in the Shadows
episodes.overview: Father Brown gets involved with MI5, which puts Lady Felicia in a compromising position.

episodes.name: The Curse of Amenhotep
episodes.overview: After Sir Raleigh's new bride insists on seeing his Egyptian mummy, she is found dead.

episodes.name: The Invisible Man
episodes.overview: The circus brings death to Kembleford when a clown is murdered.

episodes.name: The Sign of the Broken Sword
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates a murder at the local army barracks.

episodes.name: The Last Man
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates when Kembleford's new cricket captain is framed for murder.

episodes.name: The Upcott Fraternity
episodes.overview: Father Brown witnesses the apparent suicide of a student but is convinced it is murder.

episodes.name: The Kembleford Boggart
episodes.overview: Father Brown must act fast to save a member of Kembleford's travelling community.

episodes.name: The Lair of the Libertines
episodes.overview: Father Brown and his friends find themselves stranded at a hotel with a group of hedonists

episodes.name: The Truth in the Wine
episodes.overview: When a body is discovered in a vineyard, Father Brown must search for the murderer.

episodes.name: The Judgement of Man
episodes.overview: Father Brown becomes embroiled in an audacious art heist masterminded by Flambeau.

episodes.name: The Time Machine
episodes.overview: Father Brown visits Jacob, who has a new invention - a time machine.

episodes.name: The Standing Stones
episodes.overview: A death at a stone circle leads Father Brown to conclude that dark forces are at work.

episodes.name: The Paradise of Thieves
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates when a dead man is found inside a locked bank vault.

episodes.name: The Deadly Seal
episodes.overview: Father Brown is told that Bishop Talbot will be assassinated.

episodes.name: The Owl of Minerva
episodes.overview: Father Brown is stunned to learn that Inspector Sullivan is wanted for murder.

3.name: Series 3
3.overview: In this series the priest finds himself embroiled with the Secret  Service, which puts Lady Felicia in a compromising position. Sid is sent  undercover into a theological college to flush out a killer and Mrs  McCarthy takes on a group of travellers when a local man is found dead.  Finally a fugitive takes sanctuary in St Mary's. Father Brown is stunned  to realise that the man in the confessional is in fact Inspector  Sullivan - and he's wanted for murder.

episodes.name: The Mask of the Demon
episodes.overview: When the production of Demon Brides comes to Kembleford and the director of the film is murdered, Father Brown investigates.

episodes.name: The Brewer's Daughter
episodes.overview: Sid falls for the heiress of a local brewery, just before she is arrested on suspicion of murdering her father.

episodes.name: The Hangman's Demise
episodes.overview: Father Brown is called in to investigate the poisoning of a former hangman.

episodes.name: The Crackpot of the Empire
episodes.overview: A former music hall comedian swears revenge and traps Father Brown in a derelict building.

episodes.name: The Daughter of Autolycus
episodes.overview: Flambeau needs Father Brown's help in stealing the Pope's coronation gift to the Queen of England.

episodes.name: The Rod of Asclepius
episodes.overview: Lady Felicia winds up in hospital after some reckless driving.

episodes.name: The Missing Man
episodes.overview: Father Brown realises that an apparent suicide of a pilot is in fact murder.

episodes.name: The Resurrectionists
episodes.overview: Father Brown tries to find out why the body of a man has been taken from his grave.

episodes.name: The Sins of the Father
episodes.overview: Lady Felicia loses her singing voice. Father Brown investigates the murder of a local aeronautics magnate.

episodes.name: The Wrath of Baron Samdi
episodes.overview: Father Brown runs into a voodoo priest who will do anything to get the woman he loves back.

4.name: Series 4
4.overview: This season, a man missing for years returns just as his wife is about to remarry, but when he’s found dead, suspicion falls on those closest to him. The village gets a dose of Hollywood glamour when a film crew arrives. And Sid’s romance with a brewer’s daughter gets complicated when he finds out she’s not only married and he is also her alibi for the night her father is murdered.

episodes.name: The Star of Jacob
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger, a missing donkey, an outbreak of laryngitis in the church choir and a kidnapped baby threaten to spoil Kembleford's Christmas festivities.

episodes.name: The Labyrinth of the Minotaur
episodes.overview: Father Brown is asked to look after Lady Felicia's wayward niece Bunty, who soon finds herself suspected of murder.

episodes.name: The Eve of St John
episodes.overview: Father Brown struggles to promote understanding when a group of pagans are suspected of killing one of their own.

episodes.name: The Chedworth Cyclone
episodes.overview: Father Brown is drawn into the shady world of boxing when a local fighter is found dead in suspicious circumstances.

episodes.name: The Hand of Lucia
episodes.overview: When a local writer is murdered, Father Brown must delve into her infamous novel Lulu and Lucia for inspiration.

episodes.name: The Eagle and the Daw
episodes.overview: When an old foe tells him that she has arranged the death of her former lover, Father Brown soon finds himself blamed for the murder.

episodes.name: The Smallest of Things
episodes.overview: Past and present collide when Father Brown investigates the macabre world of dollhouse crime scenes.

episodes.name: The Crimson Feather
episodes.overview: When Mrs McCarthy's god-daughter goes missing, Father Brown follows her trail to a risque gentlemen's club.

episodes.name: The Lepidopterist's Companion
episodes.overview: When Mrs McCarthy takes over the running of the mobile library, Father Brown discovers a shocking secret lurking among the bookshelves.

episodes.name: The Alchemist's Secret
episodes.overview: Father Brown must investigate a 300 year old secret hidden in a University in order to save an old friend.

episodes.name: The Sins of Others
episodes.overview: Father Brown struggles to save Sid from himself when he vows vengeance on his former defence barrister.

episodes.name: The Theatre of the Invisible
episodes.overview: When radio quiz Up To You comes to Kembleford, Father Brown suspects that one of the cast are responsible for their landlady’s murder.

episodes.name: The Tanganyika Green
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates the murder of a Colonial Postal Service officer when the fair comes to Kembleford.

episodes.name: The Fire in the Sky
episodes.overview: Father Brown’s divine inspiration is called upon when Kembleford comes under threat of an alien invasion.

episodes.name: The Penitent Man
episodes.overview: Father Brown suspects an ulterior motive is at play when his old adversary Flambeau is incarcerated for murder.

episodes.name: The Tree of Truth
episodes.overview: A skeleton from a seven year old murder case is found buried in the woods and doubts are cast on the conviction of the confessed killer.

episodes.name: The Jackdaw's Revenge
episodes.overview: Father Brown struggles to protect those closest to him when an old foe is unexpectedly released from prison.

episodes.name: The Kembleford Dragon
episodes.overview: Father Brown must stop a much-loved institution from going off the rails when the local stationmaster is murdered.

episodes.name: The Angel of Mercy
episodes.overview: Father Brown senses something sinister afoot when Mrs McCarthy's friend is the latest villager to die in her sleep.

episodes.name: The Face of the Enemy
episodes.overview: Father Brown spies trouble when Lady Felicia returns to Kembleford.

episodes.name: The Devil You Know
episodes.overview: Mallory is forced to turn to Father Brown for help when a VIP policeman is murdered at a bowls match.

episodes.name: The Dance of Death
episodes.overview: Father Brown uncovers a dark secret when a contestant is murdered at a ballroom dancing competition.

episodes.name: The Cat of Mastigatus
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates when a girl is found left for dead at a boys' school fete.

episodes.name: The Flower of the Fairway
episodes.overview: Local feathers are ruffled when an ostentatious American opens up a golf club near Kembleford and a body is discovered in the reeds.

episodes.name: The Two Deaths of Hercule Flambeau
episodes.overview: Following reports of Flambeau's death, Father Brown races to protect a crown that contains a nail from the crucifixion of Christ.

episodes.name: The Great Train Robbery
episodes.overview: Lady Felicia and Mrs McCarthy are taken hostage when a midnight train robbery goes awry.

episodes.name: The Passing Bell
episodes.overview: A new musical director for the bell-ringers of St Marys leads to discord, disharmony and the blood-curdling sound of murder.

episodes.name: The Whistle in the Dark
episodes.overview: Father Brown must intervene when it appears that a dark spirit has murderous intent.

episodes.name: The Demise of the Debutante
episodes.overview: Father Brown uncovers secrets, hypocrisy and murder at a finishing school for young ladies.

episodes.name: The Darkest Noon
episodes.overview: When Father Brown and Mallory go missing, it's up to the gang to save them from a man hell-bent on revenge.

episodes.name: The Sacrifice of Tantalus
episodes.overview: When Mallory's pursuit of a fugitive ends in disaster, a familiar face returns to hunt the culprit.

episodes.name: The House of God
episodes.overview: Suspicions are aroused when the holiest house in Kembleford is linked to the death of a wanton woman.

episodes.name: The Blood of the Anarchists
episodes.overview: Tensions rise to deadly levels when a performance troupe of anarchists arrive in Kembleford.

episodes.name: The Skylark Scandal
episodes.overview: The Kembleford Ramblers annual outing takes a tragic turn when the local Lord is found strangled.

episodes.name: The Honourable Thief
episodes.overview: When Lady Felicia's home comes under threat, Father Brown is forced to seek help from an unlikely ally.

episodes.name: The Celestial Choir
episodes.overview: A mysterious saboteur tries to stop Kembleford winning the Three Counties choir competition.

episodes.name: The Queen Bee
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates the mysterious death of a beekeeper.

episodes.name: The Scales of Justice
episodes.overview: Father Brown races to save Bunty from the hangman's noose when she is tried for murder.

episodes.name: The Wisdom of the Fool
episodes.overview: Murder is no laughing matter when Father Brown visits a jester convention.

episodes.name: The Folly of Jephthah
episodes.overview: Flambeau seeks Father Brown's help to get rid of an unwanted rival.

episodes.name: The Numbers of the Beast
episodes.overview: Mrs McCarthy strikes it lucky at the church bingo with the help of a Romani fortune teller.

episodes.name: The River Corrupted
episodes.overview: Sid returns to Kembleford to ask his old family to help save his new one.

episodes.name: The Curse of the Aesthetic
episodes.overview: Father Brown must discover who is out to kill a tortured artist before it's too late.

episodes.name: The Fall of the House of St Gardner
episodes.overview: A gossip columnist is murdered after threatening to expose the secrets of a fashion house.

episodes.name: The Tower of Lost Souls
episodes.overview: Father Brown joins forces with Chief Inspector Valentine to uncover a dark secret at Helmsley House.

episodes.name: The Menace of Mephistopheles
episodes.overview: Goodfellow turns to Father Brown when he witnesses Mallory frame an innocent man.

episodes.name: The Viper's Tongue
episodes.overview: Mrs McCarthy gets an unwelcome birthday surprise when her life is threatened by a mysterious avenging angel.

episodes.name: The Requiem for the Dead
episodes.overview: Father Brown must delve into the past and open up old wounds when a child killer is found murdered.

episodes.name: The Children of Kalon
episodes.overview: When a troubled soul from the past returns, Father Brown must investigate the new chapter of the Church of Apollo.

episodes.name: The Final Devotion
episodes.overview: Father Brown joins forces with Flambeau to search for a lost treasure in a 15th-century castle.

episodes.name: The New Order
episodes.overview: Father Brown finds his position under threat when he clashes with an influential new parishioner.

episodes.name: The Island of Dreams
episodes.overview: When Father Brown visits Chummy's holiday camp, it doesn't take long for someone to die-de-die.

episodes.name: The Wayward Girls
episodes.overview: Bunty reunites with Father Brown to uncover a dark secret at the local girls' borstal.

episodes.name: The Enigma of Antigonish
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates staff at the local health spa when an ex-employee is found murdered.

episodes.name: The Red Death
episodes.overview: Lady Felicia’s lavish New Year ball is ruined when a VIP is murdered.

episodes.name: The Winds of Change
episodes.overview: Father Brown discovers that a murderer is using Kembleford’s new model village to plan their attacks. He also needs to find a new secretary following Mrs McCarthy’s departure.

episodes.name: The Company of Men
episodes.overview: Lady Felicia’s impromptu visit coincides with Father Brown helping out a friend at an exclusive gentlemen’s club.

episodes.name: The Gardeners of Eden
episodes.overview: A celebrity florist brings glamour and murder to Kembleford.

episodes.name: The Beast of Wedlock
episodes.overview: Father Brown’s past collides with the present when he investigates a missing person, a murder and a mythical wild cat.

episodes.name: The Hidden Man
episodes.overview: Chief Inspector Sullivan pays Father Brown a visit to warn him that Hercule Flambeau is on the run and wanted for a series of brutal murders.

episodes.name: The Royal Visit
episodes.overview: The visit of Princess Margaret to Kembleford is jeopardised when a school janitor is found murdered.

episodes.name: The Show Must Go On
episodes.overview: Father Brown discovers there’s more drama offstage than on in the latest production by the Kembleford Players.

episodes.name: The Sands of Time
episodes.overview: Brenda finds love at the home of a clock collector, but has she fallen for a killer?

episodes.name: The Wheels of Wrath
episodes.overview: Rock 'n' roll reaches Kembleford when a group of bikers cause outrage and excitement in equal measure.

episodes.name: The Serpent Within
episodes.overview: Sullivan’s dream of leaving Kembleford is scuppered when he is arrested for receiving stolen goods.

episodes.name: The Kembleston Olimpicks
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates when rivalries escalate to murderous heights at the Kembleston Olimpicks.

episodes.name: The Forensic Nun
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates when his old friend Sister Boniface is implicated in the murder of a renowned artist.

episodes.name: The Hermit of Hazelnut Cottage
episodes.overview: Brenda faces ghosts from her past and becomes embroiled in a local dispute that ends in murder.

episodes.name: The Last Supper
episodes.overview: Father Brown has a lot on his plate when a food fayre comes to Kembleford, bringing murder with it.

episodes.name: The Father, The Son
episodes.overview: Flambeau is stunned to find his estranged father at St Mary’s, who has a dangerous mission in mind.

episodes.name: The Quill of Osric
episodes.overview: Father Brown must discover the culprit when a novelist is attacked at a crime-writing festival.

episodes.name: The Word of the Condemned
episodes.overview: Lady Felicia asks Father Brown to help prove a convicted serial killer didn’t murder her beloved goddaughter.

episodes.name: The Last Tango in Kembleford
episodes.overview: Father Brown investigates when the competitive atmosphere at a local dance school leads to a dance with death.

episodes.name: The Dead of Night
episodes.overview: Father Brown is determined to unmask a mortal being when a supposed vampire strikes in the village.

episodes.name: The Scars of War
episodes.overview: Sullivan asks for Father Brown’s help when Mrs Devine’s son Eddie is framed for murder.
